price: 65. Waxay yidhaahdeen: “Muusow! Ama tuur (usha) ama aan innagu ahaanno kuwa hor tuura?”
arabic: قَالُواْ يَٰمُوسَىٰٓ إِمَّآ أَن تُلۡقِيَ وَإِمَّآ أَن نَّكُونَ أَوَّلَ مَنۡ أَلۡقَىٰ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: qālū yāmūsā immā an tul'qiya wa-immā an nakūna awwala man alqā
